== Jun Kobayashi ==

I'm living and working in Osaka, Japan and the contact of the Japanese Team.

** E-Mail: jkbys@ubuntu.com kobayashi@ubuntulinux.jp kobayashi@junkobayashi.jp
** GPG key ID: D16BCB91
** Launchpad: https://launchpad.net/~jkbys

=== Ubuntu related activities ===

** I started Ubuntu Japanese Local Community Team in May 2005.

** I maintain Japanese Team <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntulinux.jp|Web site]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntulinux.jp|Forum]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-jp|Mailing List]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntulinux.jp/|Wiki]]</nowiki>.
 
** I've been taking the chair of #ubuntu-jp IRC meeting once a week - <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntulinux.jp/IRCMeeting|Meeting agenda and summuries]]</nowiki> (Japanese)

** I build and distribute Japanese Remix Ubuntu Desktop CD - <nowiki>[[DerivativeTeam-Derivatives-Japanese]]</nowiki>

** I talked about Ubuntu with some Japanese organizations which are interested in Ubuntu.

** I wrote Japanese notes and appendixes for the Japanese edition of Ubuntu Official Book.

=== My vision for Ubuntu ===

I want to work for making Ubuntu major OS in Japan. For that purpose, I'll continue Japanese Team activity, commit for Ubuntu to make better support for Japanese and other multibyte language(see <nowiki>[[BetterCJKSupportSpecification]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[DerivativeTeam-Derivatives-Japanese]]</nowiki>), and write Ubuntu related web and magazine articles for Japanese users.
